definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: However, less effort is required because of the higher gear ratio.
sentences.chinese: 可是，高的角传动比可以使转向更轻便。

sentences.english: The gear sector of variable transmission ratio in automobile steering mechanism is a variable module non-circular gear.
sentences.chinese: 变传动比汽车转向器齿扇是变模数的非圆齿轮。

sentences.english: The speed ratio is the ratio of the shaft transmission to the first digit wheel transmission.
sentences.chinese: 速比配置数是出轴与头位字轮传动比。

sentences.english: The transmission ratio of the gear is completely the same as the ratio of the numbers of the axial grooves on the corresponding roller.
sentences.chinese: 齿轮的传动比与对应的圆辊上的轴向槽数比完全相同。

sentences.english: A method of measuring transmission ratio is studied.
sentences.chinese: 传动比测试方法的研究。

sentences.english: When the meshing efficiency of closed epicyclic gear trains is computed, the method of drive-ratio is used often.
sentences.chinese: 在计算封闭式周转轮系的啮合效率时，常用传动比法。

sentences.english: The outstanding advantage of 2K H plus mechanism is its possibility of obtaining high transmitting ratio.
sentences.chinese: 正号机构突出的优点是获得大传动比。

definition: angular velocity/number of revolutions per minute
(of opposing teeth, or gears) to mesh/to engage
(in a manual car) gear (i.e. reverse, neutral, 1st, 2nd etc)/(automatic car) transmission mode (P, R, N, D etc)/(electric fan etc) speed setting
